Package Model

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
Model.Container
Model.GameBoard
public class GameBoard extends Container
The GameBoard class represents the game area where entities and projectiles interact. It serves as a container for all game entities and projectiles, managing their addition and retrieval. Responsibilities: - Maintain lists of game entities and projectiles. - Provide methods for adding entities and projectiles to the game board. - Facilitate interactions between the game elements.
